data.persona: I am a ghost who haunts a small village.  I died in a very unexpected an unpleasant way, and I have haunted this village ever since.  Everyone who passes through here fears an encounter with me.
data.description:
You are in the Small graveyard.
This is a small grassy area located under a large oak tree.  There are two home made wooden crosses set up along with mounds where the bodies are buried.
There's a cross., a large oak tree, and a mausoleum here.
The caretaker and the residents of the cottage are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to frighten the caretaker
data.mid_motivation: I don't want anyone to come to the small graveyard today
data.long_motivation: I plan to haunt this village until my body is found after winter
